document.full_text: clashes between tribesmen in the remote, arid northern region of kenya that borders ethiopia killed at least 19 people and security has been beefed up in case of more reprisals, officials said tuesday.
document.title: at least 19 dead in kenya, ethiopia border clashes
lines_and_colors: clashes between tribesmen in the remote, arid northern region of kenya that borders ethiopia killed at least 19 people and security has been beefed up in case of more reprisals, officials said tuesday.
